issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing Kitchensink, Base UI>Animation>2D transform, I waited for the cloud animations to complete and noticed that a large image of each cloud was flashed on the screen at the end of the animation cycle.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.8.0 on iPod 3rd gen.
2) Navigate toBase UI>Animation>2D transform
3) Tap "animate" button to begin animation
4) Watch closely as the animations complete

Result:
A large cloud image is flashed at the end of each cloud's animation cycle

Expected result:
The animation completes without additional images being displayed

Notes:
Occurs with 1.7.2 as well.
fields.summary: iOS: Kitchensink: Base UI>Animation>2D transform, Cloud animations end with a flash of a full-sized cloud image
fields.environment: SDK 1.8.0.v20110819142548 on iPod 3rd Gen 4.0.2, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.4.201108101535

comments.body:
Bug still exists on

Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.0.201206081630
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120608174150
Device: iPad 3(5.1.1)
Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
